title: TaxEasy_ZA â€“ Irhafu Yakho. Ulwimi Lwakho. Kwenziwe Lwalula.
tagline: Irhafu Yakho. Ulwimi Lwakho. Kwenziwe Lwalula.
enter_id_passport: Faka inombolo yakho ye-ID okanye yepasipoti
welcome_intro: Le khalityhuleyitha yerhafu yobungcali iya kukunceda ukuba ubale ngokuchanekileyo irhafu yakho yengeniso yomntu eMzantsi Afrika yonyaka werhafu ka-2025 (1 Matshi 2024 - 28 Februwari 2025).
welcome_instructions: Nceda ugcwalise zonke iindawo ngokuchanekileyo. Sebenzisa amaqhosha okuhamba phezulu ukuhamba phakathi kwamaphepha, kwaye ubeke isikhombisi phezu kweempawu zemibuzo ukufumana iingcebiso eziluncedo.
calculation_error_message: Kukho impazamo ekubaleni irhafu yakho. Nceda ujonge okufakileyo kwaye uzame kwakhona.
footer_text: Akukho datha eqokelelweyo okanye egciniweyo. Ihambelana ne-POPIA.
age_tooltip:
Imida Yerhafu (2025):
Ngaphantsi kwe-65: R95,750
65-75: R148,217
Ngaphezulu kwe-75: R165,689
Ukuba ingeniso yakho ingaphantsi kwale mida, usenokungadingi ukuhlawula irhafu.
basic_salary_tooltip:
Ikhowudi 3601: Umvuzo Osisiseko
Umvuzo wakho oqhelekileyo wenyanga okanye wonyaka ngaphambi kokuthotywa.
Isalathiso: Icandelo 1, Umthetho Werhafu Yengeniso
Faka yonke ingeniso yomsebenzi eqhelekileyo apha.
bonus_tooltip:
Ikhowudi 3605: Ibhonasi/Iintlawulo Zonyaka
Iitsheki ze-13th, iibhonasi zokusebenza, intlawulo yeholide.
Isalathiso: Icandelo 1, Umthetho Werhafu Yengeniso
Zonke iintlawulo zebhonasi zirhafiswa ngokupheleleyo.
commission_tooltip:
Ikhowudi 3606: Ikhomishini
Iikhomishini zokuthengisa kunye neentlawulo ezisekelwe ekusebenzeni.
Isalathiso: Icandelo 1, Umthetho Werhafu Yengeniso
Faka yonke ingeniso yekhomishini efunyenweyo.
overtime_tooltip:
Ikhowudi 3607: Ixesha Elongezelelweyo
Iintlawulo zomsebenzi ongaphezulu kweeyure eziqhelekileyo.
Isalathiso: Icandelo 1, Umthetho Werhafu Yengeniso
Zonke iintlawulo zexesha elongezelelweyo zirhafiswa.
travel_allowance_tooltip:
Ikhowudi 3701: Isibonelelo Sokuhamba
Isibonelelo esifunyenweyo ngeendleko zokuhamba zeshishini.
Isalathiso: Icandelo 8(1)(b), Umthetho Werhafu Yengeniso
Ungabanga iindleko zangempela ngokuchasene nesi sibonelelo.
other_allowance_tooltip:
Ikhowudi 3713: Ezinye Izibonelelo
Iifowuni, ikhompyutha, izibonelelo zokuzonwabisa.
Isalathiso: Icandelo 1, Umthetho Werhafu Yengeniso
Izibonelelo ezininzi zirhafiswa ngaphandle kokuba zikhululwe ngokukhethekileyo.
vehicle_fringe_tooltip:
Ikhowudi 3802: Inzuzo Yesithuthi Engenziwe
Ixabiso lokusetyenziswa komntu kwesithuthi senkampani.
Isalathiso: Isiqendu 7, Ishedyuli Yesixhenxe
Kubalwa njengepesenti yexabiso lesithuthi.
medical_fringe_tooltip:
Ikhowudi 3810: Inzuzo Yezonyango
Igalelo lomqeshi lezonyango elidlula imida.
Isalathiso: Icandelo 11(a), Umthetho Werhafu Yengeniso
Igalelo elingaphezulu kuphela elirhafiswayo.
housing_fringe_tooltip:
Ikhowudi 3804: Inzuzo Yezindlu
Ixabiso lendawo yokuhlala enikezelwe ngumqeshi.
Isalathiso: Isiqendu 9, Ishedyuli Yesixhenxe
Indawo yokuhlala yasimahla okanye exhaswayo irhafiswa.
meals_fringe_tooltip:
Ikhowudi 3808: Inzuzo Yokutya
Ixabiso lokutya elinikezelwe ngumqeshi.
Isalathiso: Isiqendu 11, Ishedyuli Yesixhenxe
Iinzuzo zokutya eziqhelekileyo zirhafiswa.
other_fringe_tooltip:
Ikhowudi 3812: Ezinye Iinzuzo Ezingezizo
Naziphi na ezinye iinzuzo ezinikezelwe ngumqeshi.
Isalathiso: Ishedyuli Yesixhenxe, Umthetho Werhafu Yengeniso
Iinzuzo ezininzi zomqeshi zineempembelelo zerhafu.
interest_tooltip:
Ingeniso Yenzala
Inzala yebhanki, iidipozithi ezisisigxina, iibhondi.
Ukukhululwa: R23,800 (ngaphantsi kwe-65), R34,500 (65+)
Isalathiso: Icandelo 10(1)(i), Umthetho Werhafu Yengeniso
dividend_tooltip:
Ingeniso Yezabelo
Izabelo ezivela kwiinkampani zaseMzantsi Afrika.
Ukukhululwa: R30,000 ngonyaka
Isalathiso: Icandelo 64B(2), Umthetho Werhafu Yengeniso
rental_tooltip:
Ingeniso Yokuqesha
Ingeniso evela kwiipropati eziqashisayo.
Qaphela: Irhafiswa ngokupheleleyo, iindleko ziyathotywa
Isalathiso: Icandelo 1, Umthetho Werhafu Yengeniso
paye_paid_tooltip:
I-PAYE (Pay-As-You-Earn)
Irhafu ethotywa nyanga zonke ngumqeshi wakho.
Isalathiso: Ishedyuli Yesine, Umthetho Werhafu Yengeniso
Okuvela kwisitifiketi sakho se-IRP5.
uif_paid_tooltip:
Igalelo le-UIF
Igalelo leNgxowa-mali Yomshwalense Wokungasebenzi.
Umlinganiselo: 1% womvuzo (ubukhulu R177.12/ngenyanga)
Isalathiso: Umthetho we-UIF
provisional_tax_tooltip:
Irhafu Yesikhashana
Irhafu ehlawulwe kwangaphambili ngengeniso engeyiyo eyomvuzo.
Isalathiso: Ishedyuli Yesine, Umthetho Werhafu Yengeniso
Iyafuneka ukuba unengeniso engeyiyo eyomsebenzi ebalulekileyo.
pension_tooltip:
Ikhowudi 4001: Ingxowa-mali Yempesheni
Igalelo lakho kwingxowa-mali yempesheni yomqeshi.
Umda: Okuncinci kwe-R350,000 okanye 27.5% yengeniso
Isalathiso: Icandelo 11F, Umthetho Werhafu Yengeniso
prov_tooltip:
Ikhowudi 4003: Ingxowa-mali Yempesheni
Igalelo lakho kwingxowa-mali yempesheni yomqeshi.
Umda: Okuncinci kwe-R350,000 okanye 27.5% yengeniso
Isalathiso: Icandelo 11F, Umthetho Werhafu Yengeniso
ra_tooltip:
Ikhowudi 4006: I-Annuity Yempesheni
Igalelo lakho lobuqu le-annuity yempesheni.
Umda: Okuncinci kwe-R350,000 okanye 27.5% yengeniso
Isalathiso: Icandelo 11F, Umthetho Werhafu Yengeniso
donation_tooltip:
Ikhowudi 4030: Iminikelo
Iminikelo kwimibutho elungiselelweyo yengeniso yoluntu.
Umda: 10% yengeniso erhafiswayo
Isalathiso: Icandelo 18A, Umthetho Werhafu Yengeniso
medaid_tooltip:
Ikhowudi 4005: Uncedo Lonyango
Igalelo lakho lesikimu sonyango.
Qaphela: Yenza iikhredithi zerhafu, hayi izinto ezithotywayo
Isalathiso: Icandelo 6A, Umthetho Werhafu Yengeniso
medical_members_tooltip:
Amalungu Onyango
Inani lamalungu aphambili kuncedo lonyango.
Ikhredithi: R347 ngenyanga ngelungu ngalinye
Isalathiso: Icandelo 6A, Umthetho Werhafu Yengeniso
medical_dependants_tooltip:
Abaxhomekeke Konyango
Inani labaxhomekeke kuncedo lonyango.
Ikhredithi: R347 (okuqala), R234 (okongezelelweyo)
Isalathiso: Icandelo 6A, Umthetho Werhafu Yengeniso
addmed_tooltip:
Ikhowudi 4024: Unyango Olongezelelweyo
Iindleko zonyango ezingagqunywanga luncedo lonyango.
Umda: Okungaphezulu kwe-7.5% yengeniso erhafiswayo
Isalathiso: Icandelo 18, Umthetho Werhafu Yengeniso
rental_bond_tooltip:
Inzala Yebhondi
Inzala ehlawulwe ngemalimboleko yepropati.
Qaphela: Iyathotywa ngokuchasene nengeniso yokuqesha
Isalathiso: Icandelo 11(a), Umthetho Werhafu Yengeniso
rental_rates_tooltip:
Amaxabiso & Iirhafu
Amaxabiso kamasipala kunye neerhafu zepropati.
Qaphela: Iyathotywa ngokuchasene nengeniso yokuqesha
Isalathiso: Icandelo 11(a), Umthetho Werhafu Yengeniso
rental_insurance_tooltip:
I-inshurensi Yepropati
Iipremiyamu ze-inshurensi zepropati eqashisayo.
Qaphela: Iyathotywa ngokuchasene nengeniso yokuqesha
Isalathiso: Icandelo 11(a), Umthetho Werhafu Yengeniso
rental_repairs_tooltip:
Ukulungisa & Ukugcinwa
Ukulungisa kwangoku, hayi ukuphuculwa.
Qaphela: Iyathotywa ngokuchasene nengeniso yokuqesha
Isalathiso: Icandelo 11(d), Umthetho Werhafu Yengeniso
rental_depreciation_tooltip:
Isibonelelo Sokuhla Kwenani
Isibonelelo sokuhla kwenani lesakhiwo.
Umlinganiselo: 5% ngonyaka kwindleko
Isalathiso: Icandelo 11(g), Umthetho Werhafu Yengeniso
rental_agent_tooltip:
Imirhumo Yomenzeli
Ulawulo lwepropati kunye nemirhumo yokuqesha.
Qaphela: Iyathotywa ngokuchasene nengeniso yokuqesha
Isalathiso: Icandelo 11(a), Umthetho Werhafu Yengeniso
rental_other_tooltip:
Ezinye Iindleko Zokuqesha
Ezinye iindleko zokuqesha ezivumelekileyo.
Qaphela: Kufuneka zifumaneke ukuze kufumaneke ingeniso
Isalathiso: Icandelo 11(a), Umthetho Werhafu Yengeniso
software_licenses_tooltip:
Iilayisensi Zesofthiwe
Iindleko zeelayisensi zesofthiwe ezinxulumene ngqo nomsebenzi wakho we-IT (umz., izixhobo zophuhliso, isofthiwe yoyilo).
Isalathiso: Icandelo 11(a), Umthetho Werhafu Yengeniso
Kufuneka zinxulumane ngqo nemisebenzi yokufumana ingeniso.
hardware_upgrades_tooltip:
Ukuphuculwa Kwehardware
Iindleko zokuphuculwa kwehardware efunekayo kumsebenzi wakho we-IT wobungcali (umz., i-RAM, ii-SSD zoomatshini abathile bomsebenzi).
Isalathiso: Icandelo 11(a), Umthetho Werhafu Yengeniso
Yehla ngenani kwiminyaka emi-3 nge-33.3% ngonyaka.
medical_equipment_tooltip:
Izixhobo Zonyango
Izixhobo zonyango ezibalulekileyo zokuziqhelanisa (umz., iistethoscope, izixhobo zokuxilonga).
Isalathiso: Icandelo 11(a), Umthetho Werhafu Yengeniso
Iistethoscope, izixhobo zokuxilonga, njl.
professional_insurance_tooltip:
I-inshurensi Yokuzikhusela Ngobungcali
Iipremiyamu ezihlawulweyo ze-inshurensi yokuzikhusela ngobungcali efunekayo kubasebenzi bezempilo.
Isalathiso: Icandelo 11(a), Umthetho Werhafu Yengeniso
Iipremiyamu ziyathotywa ngokupheleleyo.
financial_software_tooltip:
Iirhafu Zesofthiwe Yezimali
Iirhafu zesofthiwe yohlalutyo lwezimali, iiplatifomu zokurhweba, okanye izixhobo zokubala.
Isalathiso: Icandelo 11(a), Umthetho Werhafu Yengeniso
Kufuneka isetyenziselwe imisebenzi yokufumana ingeniso.
market_data_tooltip:
Iirhafu Zedatha Yemarike
Iindleko zedatha yemarike yexesha lokwenyani, iindaba zezimali, okanye iirhafu zophando.
Isalathiso: Icandelo 11(a), Umthetho Werhafu Yengeniso
Kufuneka inxulumane ngqo nomsebenzi wakho.
classroom_supplies_tooltip:
Izinto Zokufundisa
Iincwadi zokusebenza, izixhobo zelabhoratri, izinto zobugcisa
Iimfuneko: Iiodolo zokuthenga zesikolo, uluhlu lwezinto
Umda: R15k umda wonyaka
Isalathiso: Izikhokelo ze-SACE
educational_materials_tooltip:
Izixhobo Zokufundisa
Izinto zekharityhulam ezivunyiweyo, iiplatifomu zokufunda nge-e-learning
Iimfuneko: Ukuhambelana nekharityhulam ye-CAPS
Isalathiso: Isaziso se-DBE 12/2025
safety_equipment_tooltip:
Izixhobo Zokukhusela Zokumbiwa Phantsi
Izixhobo ezibalulekileyo kunye nezixhobo ezifunekayo kukhuseleko kwimisebenzi yokumbiwa phantsi, kubandakanya iimpahla zokukhusela ezikhethekileyo kunye nezixhobo zokuphefumla.
Isalathiso: Icandelo 11(a), Umthetho Werhafu Yengeniso
occupation_specific_tooltip:
Iindleko Ezithile Zomsebenzi
Izixhobo, izixhobo, kunye neendleko ezithile zomsebenzi wakho.
Isalathiso: Icandelo 11(a), Umthetho Werhafu Yengeniso
Kufuneka zinxulumane ngqo nokufumana ingeniso.
cpd_expenses_tooltip:
Iindleko ze-CPD/Zezifundo
Uphuhliso lobungcali oluqhubekayo, iziqinisekiso, uqeqesho.
Isalathiso: Icandelo 11(a), Umthetho Werhafu Yengeniso
membership_fees_tooltip:
Imirhumo Yobulungu Bobungcali
Imirhumo yonyaka kwimibutho yobungcali okanye imibutho enxulumene nomsebenzi wakho.
Isalathiso: Icandelo 11(a), Umthetho Werhafu Yengeniso
books_materials_tooltip:
Iincwadi & Izinto Zokufunda
Iincwadi zobugcisa, iimagazini, kunye nezinye izinto zokufunda ezinxulumene ngqo nomsebenzi wakho.
Isalathiso: Icandelo 11(a), Umthetho Werhafu Yengeniso
tools_equipment_tooltip:
Izixhobo & Izixhobo
Iindleko zezixhobo kunye nezixhobo ezifunekayo kumsebenzi wakho.
Isalathiso: Icandelo 11(e), Umthetho Werhafu Yengeniso
home_office_tooltip:
Iofisi Yasekhaya
Iindleko zeofisi yasekhaya ukuba isetyenziswa kuphela kwaye rhoqo ngeenjongo zeshishini.
Isalathiso: Icandelo 23(b), Umthetho Werhafu Yengeniso
travel_expenses_tooltip:
Ukuhamba & Ezothutho
Iindleko ezifunyenweyo zokuhamba zeshishini, kubandakanya ipetroli, ukugcinwa, imirhumo yentlawulo, kunye nokupaka.
Isalathiso: Icandelo 8(1)(b), Umthetho Werhafu Yengeniso
fuel_expenses_tooltip:
Iindleko Zepetroli
Iindleko zepetroli zokuhamba zeshishini.
Qaphela: Incwadi yokuhamba iyafuneka.
Isalathiso: Icandelo 11(a), Umthetho Werhafu Yengeniso
maintenance_expenses_tooltip:
Ukugcinwa Kwesithuthi
Iindleko zokugcinwa kwesithuthi zokuhamba zeshishini.
Qaphela: Incwadi yokuhamba iyafuneka.
Isalathiso: Icandelo 11(a), Umthetho Werhafu Yengeniso
insurance_expenses_tooltip:
I-inshurensi Yesithuthi
Iindleko ze-inshurensi yesithuthi zokuhamba zeshishini.
Qaphela: Incwadi yokuhamba iyafuneka.
Isalathiso: Icandelo 11(a), Umthetho Werhafu Yengeniso
toll_fees_tooltip:
Imirhumo Yentlawulo
Iindleko zemirhumo yentlawulo efumaneke ngokuhamba kweshishini.
Qaphela: Gcina iirisithi.
Isalathiso: Icandelo 11(a), Umthetho Werhafu Yengeniso
parking_fees_tooltip:
Imirhumo Yokupaka
Iindleko zemirhumo yokupaka efumaneke ngokuhamba kweshishini.
Qaphela: Gcina iirisithi.
Isalathiso: Icandelo 11(a), Umthetho Werhafu Yengeniso
solar_water_heater_tooltip:
Isifudumezi Samanzi Esisebenza Ngelanga
Isibonelelo sokufaka isifudumezi samanzi esisebenza ngelanga.
Isalathiso: Icandelo 12B, Umthetho Werhafu Yengeniso
solar_panels_tooltip:
Inkqubo Ye-Solar PV
Isibonelelo sokufaka inkqubo ye-solar PV.
Isalathiso: Icandelo 12B, Umthetho Werhafu Yengeniso
other_renewable_tooltip:
Amanye Amandla Ahlaziyekayo
Olunye utyalo-mali lwamandla ahlaziyekayo olufanelekileyo.
Isalathiso: Icandelo 12B, Umthetho Werhafu Yengeniso
legal_fees_tooltip:
Imirhumo Yomthetho
Imirhumo yomthetho efumaneke ukuze kufumaneke ingeniso.
Qaphela: Kufuneka inxulumane nemisebenzi yokufumana ingeniso.
Isalathiso: Icandelo 11(a), Umthetho Werhafu Yengeniso
allowance_expenses_tooltip:
Iindleko Zesibonelelo
Iindleko ezichasene nezibonelelo ezifunyenweyo.
Qaphela: Iirekhodi kufuneka zigcinwe.
Isalathiso: Icandelo 8(1), Umthetho Werhafu Yengeniso
pdf_error: Kukho impazamo ekwenzeni i-PDF. Nceda uzame kwakhona.
professional_body_fees_tooltip:
Yintoni: Ibango elipheleleyo elivumelekileyo kwimirhumo yonyaka kwimibutho yabasebenzi/imibutho yobungcali efunekayo kumsebenzi wakho.

Ubungqina: Iirisithi okanye iingxelo zonyaka.

Ikhowudi ye-SARS/IRP5: Ikhowudi 4040/4041.

Isalathiso: Icandelo 11(a), Umthetho Werhafu Yengeniso; Isikhokelo se-SARS PAYE
uniforms_protective_clothing_tooltip:
Yintoni: Iindleko zeeyunifomu ezithile kumsebenzi wakho, ezinyanzelekileyo kwaye ezingezizo iimpahla eziqhelekileyo.

Imida: Kufuneka zicace kwaye zifuneke; iimpahla eziqhelekileyo azinakubangwa.

Ubungqina: Ii-invoyisi/iirisithi, umyalelo/ubungqina bomqeshi.

Ikhowudi ye-SARS/IRP5: Ikhowudi 3714/3764.

Isalathiso: Isikhokelo se-SARS PAYE

welcome_guide.title: TaxEasy_ZA: Isikhokelo Sokuqalisa Esilula
welcome_guide.subtitle: Wamkelekile kwi-TaxEasy_ZA! Esi sikhokelo siya kukunceda ukuba uhambe kwi-app kwaye usebenzise ngokupheleleyo iimpawu zayo.

steps.title: Khetha ulwimi lwakho
steps.description: Phezulu ekunene kwiphepha, khetha ulwimi olukhethayo kuluhlu oluhlayo (isiXhosa, English, Afrikaans, isiZulu, Sesotho).

steps.title: Hamba Kwizahluko
steps.description: Emva kokugwalisa icandelo 'Ulwazi Lomntu', cofa 'Okulandelayo'. I-app iququzelelwe kwizahluko ezicacileyo:

subsections.name: Ingeniso & Ulwazi lwe-IRP5
subsections.description: Apha uya kufaka ulwazi malunga nomvuzo, izibonelelo, iinzuzo ezingezizo, ingeniso yokutyala imali, kunye nerhafu esehlawulwe.

subsections.name: Izinto Ezithotywayo Ngokubanzi
subsections.description: Apha ufaka izinto ezithotywayo ngokubanzi kunye neendleko zonyango.

subsections.name: Izinto Ezithotywayo Ezithuthukileyo Nezomsebenzi
subsections.description: Ukuba kufanelekile, khetha umsebenzi wakho ukuze uvule izinto ezithotywayo ezithile.

steps.title: Sebenzisa Amaqhosha Okuhamba
items: Cofa 'Okwangaphambili' ukubuyela umva ukuze uhlaziye okanye uhlele ulwazi oludlulileyo

sections.title: Ukuqonda Iingcebiso Nezixhobo
sections.description: Kuyo yonke i-app, uya kubona iimpawu zemibuzo (?) ecaleni kweendawo ezahlukeneyo. Ezi zinika iinkcazo ezineenkcukacha malunga:

sections.title: Ukuqonda Isishwankathelo Sakho Serhafu
sections.description: Emva kokufaka lonke ulwazi, uya kufika kwiphepha 'Isishwankathelo Serhafu'. Uya kubona oku kulandelayo:

actions.description: Nje ukuba wanelisekile ngesishwankathelo sakho, ungayenza ingxelo ye-PDF ngentlawulo encinci.
Sebenzisa eli qhosha ukuhlawula ngokukhuselekileyo ngengxelo yakho ye-PDF.
Ukuba unekhowudi yesaphulelo, yifake kwindawo enikezelweyo kwaye ucofe 'Faka Isicelo'.
Ukuba uhlela naluphi na ulwazi lwakho, cofa 'Bala Kwakhona' ukuze uhlaziye isishwankathelo.

sections.title: Ufuna Uncedo?
sections.description: Cofa 'Imibuzo Ebuzwa Rhoqo' phezulu ekunene kwiphepha ukuze ufikelele kwimibuzo neempendulo eziqhelekileyo.

welcome_guide.closing_message: Siyathemba ukuba esi sikhokelo siya kukunceda ukuba usebenzise i-TaxEasy_ZA ngokufanelekileyo!

livestock_depreciation_tooltip: Ukuhla Kwexabiso Lemfuyo: Ukuthabatha ukuhla kwexabiso lemfuyo esetyenziswa kwizolimo ngenxa yeminyaka, ukonakalisa, okanye ezinye izizathu.
safety_training_tooltip: Izindleko Zokuqeqeshwa Kwezokuphepha: Izindleko ezihlaba umxhwele ngeqeqeshwa lokuphepha nelishelwe abasebenzi bezimayini.
